CustomField.formula: IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 0 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <=5000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US' , "A", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 0 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <=2000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA' , "A", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 5000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 30000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "B", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 2000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 5000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "B", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 30000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 100000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "C", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 5000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 20000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "C", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 100000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 400000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "D", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 20000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 40000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "D", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 400000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 600000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "E", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 40000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 100000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "E", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 600000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 1000000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "F", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 100000.00 && ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c <= 500000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "F", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 1000000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'US', "G", IF(ExtendedBookPriceSummary__c > 500000.00 && Country_Code__c = 'CA', "G",'' ))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Job Size
